Description: On I-495 at mile marker 46 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north entrance ramp is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 161.5 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
